docs.text: Installation NPM Package yarn add molstar or npm install molstar Mol* code can then be imported from the molstar/lib/... namespace, e.g. import { PluginContext } from 'molstar/lib/mol-plugin/context' ; Clone from GitHub git clone https://github.com/molstar/molstar.git cd molstar npm install npm build For a watch task to automatically rebuild the source code on changes, run npm run watch or if working just with the Viewer app for better performance npm run watch-viewer
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: yarn add molstar or npm install molstar Mol* code can then be imported from the molstar/lib/... namespace, e.g. import { PluginContext } from 'molstar/lib/mol-plugin/context' ;
docs.title: NPM Package

docs.text: git clone https://github.com/molstar/molstar.git cd molstar npm install npm build For a watch task to automatically rebuild the source code on changes, run npm run watch or if working just with the Viewer app for better performance npm run watch-viewer
docs.title: Clone from GitHub
